As of December 31, 2024, we owned and operated 3,644 Chipotle restaurants throughout the United States . We are passionate about providing a great guest experience and making our food more accessible to everyone . Our first Chipotle restaurant opened in Denver, Colorado in 1993 . Our devotion to seeking out high-quality ingredients, raised with respect for animals, farmers, and the environment .
 In Chipotle-owned and operated restaurants, we strive to serve only animal products that are raised in accordance with criteria we have established in an effort to improve sustainability and promote animal welfare . We brand our meats as “Responsibly Raised®” We also seek to use responsibly grown produce grown by suppliers whose practices conform to our Food with Integrity standards .
 Chipotle is committed to serving only safe, high-quality food . Certain key ingredients are purchased from a small number of suppliers . Chipotle maintains a limited list of approved suppliers, many of whom are among the top suppliers in the industry . We closely monitor industry news, trade tariffs, weather, exchange rates, foreign demand, geopolitical crises and other world events .
 Digital sales represent food and beverage revenue for company-owned restaurants generated through the Chipotle website, Chipotle app or third-party delivery aggregators . Digital sales represented 35.1% of revenue in 2024, compared to 37.4% in 2023 . The Food Safety Advisory Council is comprised of some of the nation’s foremost food safety authorities .
 As of December 31, 2024, Chipotle employed 130,504 people worldwide and 1,328 contract workers . Of our employees, 127,820 worked in the United States, and 2,684 worked internationally across Canada, France, Germany, and the UK . In 2024, over 85% of our in-restaurant leadership roles were filled through internal promotions, which remains a critical component to our staffing strategy .
 Chipotle is on a journey to create a global culture where everyone is welcome and feels a genuine sense of belonging . In 2024, Chipotle continued to invest in employee development and training . Our learning programs include inclusive topics and skill-building to provide our leaders with the resources they need to succeed in their current roles and prepare for the future .
 As of December 31, 2024, 48.9% of our workforce was male and 49.8% were female . Chipotle hired a Director of C&I to create and execute a strategy for inclusion, advise across Centers of Excellence, and enhance existing programs . The company has a holistic approach to pay equity to ensure consistent and equitable compensation among its employees .
 Chipotle is committed to cultivating a high-performing workforce through a talent development strategy that prioritizes attracting, developing, and retaining exceptional talent at every level of the organization . In 2024, we promoted over 23,000 employees. Importantly, amongst our Field Leadership roles (Field Leaders, Team Directors, Regional Directors of Operations, and Regional Vice Presidents), the internal promotion rate was above 80%.
 The financial, physical, and mental well being of our employees remains our top priority . In 2024, we identified successors for 72% of key positions and continued to develop individualized development plans tailored to prepare successors for readiness . The courses are designed to align with the leadership skills necessary to excel at each level of restaurant management .
 Chipotle offers employees access to nearly 100 degrees at 10 universities, completely tuition free . The company also offers student loan payment matching programs via 401(k) retirement program . Chipotle is expanding its mental health benefits by offering free access to a mental health app to all U.S. employees . The chain also offers Career Certificates to help employees advance their careers .
 Employees encouraged to ask questions, voice concerns directly or anonymously report potential violations of Chipotle's Code of Ethics through our Respectful Workplace hotline . Employees also can raise concerns using other mechanisms, including communication with their managers or human resources business partners . We actively encourage our employees to report any issues or concerns without fear of reprisal, intimidation, or harassment .
